page.title: 08INDUSTRY IN LINTON
page.content: Linton is noted for its lack of industry,but we found the following: Cathodeon Crystals is thirty years old.They make quartz crystals which are posted to their buyers.The raw materials come from America.They employ about 160 workers,who work for 8 hours a day. Paintins get their raw materials from a place called Bradnems.They get marble for memorials from Hull.They make coffins,which are transported in vans and lorries. The model shop in Linton makes model Navy Warships.Materials come from Saffron Walden.One of the workmen said his job was very interesting.When they are finished,the buyers collect them. 10 people work there from 8-9 hours. There is also a printing works. BY:D Radcliffe,I Macaulay,S Jackson, M Wilton,D Notley.
